amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Substation in Box Butte County; expenditures.
amendatorysection.para: The Director of Administrative Services is authorized and directed to draw his warrants on the General Fund of the State of Nebraska, upon presentation to him by the Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska of certified vouchers, in an amount not to exceed the sum appropriated, and the State Treasurer is hereby directed to pay the same.
